title: ROYAL COIN RUSH
description: Drag adjacent coins to swap them, and line up three or more vertically or horizontally to remove them. Special coins appear when 4 or more coins are matched. Mix effects by combining special items! The stage is cleared when all the target coins are erased.
instructions: Swipe to move coins

title: Merge Hospital
description: Play as Doctor Player in Merge Hospital and discover the many secrets of your staff members, and what is happening in and around the Hospital. In Merge Hospital by Operate Now you will merge and build, meet and love many skilled surgeons, doctors and other interesting characters. You will learn more about their stories and how they got into the hospital. As Dr. Player you must: MERGE medical items, pies and much more! DISCOVER the story of a medical drama like in your favorite TV shows.
instructions: Merge 2 items that can be merged together. Items are generated through generators. Using a generator will reduce your energy. Once all energy is depleted you need to wait for new energy or replenish it via the shop. Completing tasks will earn you hearts, these hearts are used to progress through the story.

title: Soccer Euro Cup 2025
description: Can you hear the deafening cheers of a mighty crowd? Get pumped for the Soccer Euro Cup 2025! Pick your favorite country to represent and get ready for kickoff. Do your best to kick or headbutt the ball into your opponent's goal! How many did you manage to score? Play now, and let's find out!
instructions: For Player 1, use the WASD keys to move around and B to kick. For Player 2, use the arrow keys to move around and K to kick. Try to score the most goals within the time limit.

title: Words with Owl
description: Test your spelling skills and word recognition in this fun and challenging game! Complete words by filling in the missing letters and aim for the highest score. Unlock exciting new stages as you progress and enjoy a rewarding wordplay experience.
instructions: You'll be given incomplete words with missing letters—your goal is to click the letters in the correct order to complete them. Think fast and act quickly to earn more stars before time runs out. The faster you are, the higher your score!

title: Triple Sort 3D Home Design
description: Welcome to the world of Triple Sort 3D: Home Design, where matching meets decorating! Dive in the puzzle-solving with and begin crafting a virtual space of your dreams. Get ready to transform ugly and cluttered rooms into clean and cozy spaces! Discover the perfect blend of challenges, creativity, and an epic makeover journey that awaits you!
instructions: Find and tap 3 identical objects to complete the level

title: Monster Makeup 3D
description: Show off your makeup skills by helping monsters blend seamlessly into human society. Protect them by keeping their true identities hidden from angry mobs. Transform monsters to hide in plain sight, ensuring their survival. Customize their look by choosing skin color, changing eye lenses, adjusting their teeth, and adding the perfect wig to complete their human disguise. But be careful—make a mistake, and you might become the monster's next meal!
instructions: Use your mouse or drag and drop to make a perfect makeover.

title: Drunk Man 3D
description: Drunk Man 3D is a challenging and comedic 3D Ragdoll Physics game. In this game, players must navigate a treacherous cityscape while emulating the hindered balance of inebriation. The game features ragdoll physics, where even minor collisions can cause players to lose control and stumble.
instructions: WASD or Arrow keys

title: OhPeach-It
description: OhPeach-It is a game about dash&merge fruits that provides you fun and engaging gameplay. Game becomes more engaging when you use the idle mechanism and use power-ups. So keep the fruits dash and merge !
instructions: Held & Dash fruits with each other to make higer fruit. Make juice from fruits and score more.

title: Formula Racing Games Car Game
description: Let's Play and Enjoy car driving in all the Formula Race master 3D tracks of the world and become a champion on all the tracks of the world in the Formula Car Racing Game. Formula Car Stunts Games 3D introduces a new offline car racing game for the fans of the Formula Car simulator.
instructions: Use W,A,S,D for player movement.

title: Warfront
description: Warfront is a combat simulator for pro gamers inspired by CS, Standoff, and Valorant. Dive into the world of competitive FPS, testing your shooting and tactical skills across various levels. Assemble teams, improve your abilities, and upgrade your character to dominate in shooter eSports. Experience the thrill of classic CS and Valorant-style gameplay. Ready to become a counter master and a standoff legend? Prove it in Warfront!
instructions: PC: WASD: Move E/Q: Lean right/left Shift: Run Space: Jump C: Crouch LMB/RMB: Shoot/Aim R: Reload 1-4: Change weapons X/Z: Switch specialization Esc: Menu Tab: Score Phone/Tablet: Left joystick: Move/Run (hold forward) Buttons: Jump, crouch, reload, aim, or shoot Arrows: Change weapons/specialization Pause: Menu/score

title: Among Squid Challenge Online
description: All players, get ready. They are hiding in a maze. To win the game, you must defeat all the other players. You have a knife and must defeat everyone. Catch the players one by one and make sure they are eliminated. Don’t worry, they won’t find you. If they try to find you, hide in the ventilation holes. Defeat all the players. Be careful, and whatever you do, don't reveal yourself. If they catch you, you will lose and they will defeat you.
instructions: *Use the "Arrow keys" to move. *The game is playable on both mobile and PC. *Press the "Space" key to kill players. *Use the buttons to hide and view the map.

title: Drift Donut
description: Drift into action with this exhilarating 3D car drifting game! Master the art of drifting as you take control of a variety of cars and navigate through uniquely designed donut-shaped roads. The challenge is simple: click or tap to start drifting and keep your car on the road to earn points. With every donut road you clear, your score increases, challenging you to push your drifting skills to the limit.
instructions: Drift your way through donut roads, earn points, unlock cars, and achieve greatness in this thrilling 3D drifting game!

title: Sprunki Memory Card Match
description: Put your memory to the ultimate test with Sprunki Memory Card Match! Dive into a world of fun and challenge as you flip cards to reveal and match delightful Sprunki characters, scenes, and surprises. Perfect for kids and adults alike, this game combines entertainment with brain-boosting fun! Challenge yourself or compete with friends to see who has the sharpest memory. With Sprunki Memory Card Match, every flip is a step closer to unlocking fun surprises and reaching the top!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Zombie Redemption
description: Zombie Redemption is an action-survival game set in a world where a failed experiment has turned most of humanity into zombies. Players earn gold by defeating zombies, which can be used to unlock stronger weapons. However, zombies also attack, making quick reflexes and strategic thinking essential for survival. Combining elements of strategy, action, and survival, this game offers an unforgettable adventure in the fight to save the world.
instructions: W, A, S, D and mouse.

title: Incredible Kids Dentist
description: This is a dentist game for kids. Have you ever wanted to be a dentist? If this was your dream before, you should not miss this game. In this educational game, you can become a doctor in a hospital. You need to check the teeth of your patients.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: The Grench Couple Holiday Dress up
description: Get ready to immerse yourself in a delightful holiday-themed game with The Grench Couple Holiday Dress Up! This unique dress-up game combines festive fun with creative fashion choices, letting you design the perfect holiday outfits for the Grench and his partner. Whether you’re a fan of dressing up games or just love the Grench’s mischievous charm, this game promises a memorable and entertaining experience.
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: Ellie Chinese New Year Celebration
description: Celebrate the beauty and traditions of the Chinese New Year with Ellie in this fun and engaging game! Known as the Lunar New Year, this festival is marked by vibrant decorations, delicious food, and exciting cultural customs. Join Ellie as she prepares for the celebration by dressing up in stunning traditional outfits, decorating her space, and participating in festive activities.
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: Jelly Tower CRUSH
description: You can tap to clear the jelly of the same color as the ball. Clearing jelly will cause more jelly to collapse and disappear. Clear the objective before you run out of moves. Use bombs to clear a lot at once!
instructions: Tap to erase jelly.

title: Car Parking Stunt Games 2024
description: Play the new challenging car game on Impossible Tracks in car stunt games 3d of 2024. Join the world of real impossible tracks in car racing games. Experience the real car parking stunt game with no limits of enjoyment. Are you a fan of Hard Parking Games 2024.
instructions: Use W,A,S,D for player movement.

title: Knee Case Simulator
description: Knee Case Simulator is a delightful beauty and doctor simulation game where you get to showcase your medical skills and fashion sense! Help Tiara recover from her knee injury and give her a stylish makeover once she's feeling better.
instructions: Use MOUSE to play the game.

title: Squid Sprunki Slither Game 2
description: Squid Sprunki Slither Game 2 is a famous snake-hunting game when Sprunki head and Squid head as main avatar character in this game. You become a small snake that runs endlessly and continuously moves to eat the food, each time it eats it will become longer. Squid Sprunki Slither Game 2 is a simple game that became an instant success soon after its launch.
instructions: mouse only

title: Solitaire Klondike - Treasure Island
description: Set sail on a thrilling pirate adventure! Explore mysterious islands, uncover hidden treasures, and help a fearless heroine escape ruthless villains. Customize your experience with beautifully illustrated card decks, stunning animations, and magical boosters to tackle challenges. Relax between games with mesmerizing music and lively animated characters. Dive into a world of adventure, mystery, and enchantment!
instructions: Sort all cards into four suit piles from Ace to King. Move cards between seven stacks, alternating colors and descending ranks. Groups of cards can be moved for strategic plays. Review the deck as needed and enjoy the challenge of mastering this classic solitaire game!

title: The Sort Agency
description: You are the head of the best object sorting agency. Your goal is to bring order and cleanliness to the world. On the many levels you will be able to test your attentiveness and tactical thinking. Look for the right items in a pile of other items. But keep track of how many items you already have in your hands!
instructions: Choose 3 identical items to make them disappear from the playing field. Remove all the items from the list at the top of the game screen to pass the level.

title: Snake 2048
description: Start as a small cube in this thrilling online game! Eat smaller snakes, dodge stronger ones, and grow into a giant. Enjoy endless challenges, competitive leaderboards, and exciting gameplay. Play now and dominate the arena!
instructions: Desktop: The snake turns with the cursor. Mobile: Use the joystick to rotate the snake.

title: Nubik in the Monster World
description: The evil Huggy has kidnapped all the kittens again! This time, Noob’s armed with a whole new arsenal, including an AK-47, M16 Rifle, Rocket Launcher, Machine Gun, and two powerful Shotguns! Help Noob rescue the kittens, find loot chests, and unlock a million coins. Upgrade your character and blast TNT blocks. And don't forget, Noob’s friend is often trapped by monsters — help him escape from prison! Save the kittens and defeat the monsters!
instructions: For PC: Mouse: Rotate camera Tab/Esc: Pause WASD: Move Left Click: Shoot F/E: Interact For Mobile: Swipe: Rotate camera Joystick: Move Tap: Shoot Auto-shoot is available in settings for mobile, and you can adjust mouse sensitivity for PC and swipe sensitivity for mobile in the main menu.

title: Roblo X Zombie
description: Get ready for an intense solo survival experience in Zombie Defense Builder! As the last survivor, you must gather supplies, scavenge for collectibles, and build strong defenses to hold off waves of relentless zombies. In this action-packed, strategic game, every second counts. Gather materials, craft powerful barricades, and upgrade your defenses before the next wave hits. Can you survive the apocalypse and fend off the undead for as long as possible
instructions: arrow to move and mouse to shot

title: Pictures Riddle
description: Guess 1 word based on shown 4 pictures Discover what word can be related to pictures Game has 2 modes: “Pictures” & “Riddles” Features: - Simple & addictive gameplay - Challenging riddles - Hundreds of fun levels - … ** Credits: - Music by “Fred Patry” - Menu vector created by upklyak – www.freepik.com
instructions: Guess 1 word based on shown 4 pictures

title: Twisted Rope
description: Play Twisted Rope online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Radiant Rush
description: Radiant Rush is a minimalist synthwave drifting game where you control only the car's steering—not its speed. Your goal is to complete increasingly challenging levels while collecting all the datacubes scattered throughout.
instructions: Use the mouse, the arrow keys, A and D or your finger to steer

title: Noob in Geometry Dash
description: Move to the rhythm and help Nubik navigate challenging levels! Collect keys to unlock skins, complete courses, and see how high you can rank among the best players. Step into the beat-driven adventure!
instructions: To control the character, press or release the screen. If you press it, he flies in one direction, if you release it, he flies in the other direction.

title: Sprunki Mini Games
description: We present you a compilation of several games with the famous characters Sprunki. The first game is the classic Sprunki game but with an expanded orchestra, that is, with 9 singers. In the second game, you are presented with 10 pictures to color. While the third is a game of finding differences where you have 20 levels with 10 differences on each level.
instructions: Use your mouse or tap the screen.

title: Interior Designer - Decor Life
description: Interior Designer: Unpacking House is a delightful and relaxing casual game that allows you to explore your creativity through interior design. Whether you’re tackling specific challenges or letting your imagination run wild, this game offers an immersive experience where you can design beautiful spaces and create captivating aesthetics.
instructions: == PC Controls == - Hold LMB to drag item - Release LMB to drop item - Press R to rotate item (while holding it) - Hold Middle Mouse Button to move camera - Use Mouse Wheel to zoom in/out == Mobile Controls == - Hold to move the item - Release to place the item - Drag the item to the trash can icon to delete it (sandbox mode) - While holding the item, tap with second finger to rotate it

title: Super Stock Stack
description: Super Stock Stack challenges you to sort food cans onto shelves with speed and clever organization! Match the cans by their labels, manage the growing stock, and test your skills as the levels get tougher. Can you become the ultimate stock master?
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

title: Slope Rolling
description: Navigate a rolling ball through endless neon slopes in the Slope Rolling game! Test your reflexes dodge obstacles, and aim for the highest score in this challenge. Slope Rolling game is an exhilarating 3D arcade game that puts your reflexes and precision to the ultimate test. Guide a rolling ball down a steep, neon-lit slope filled with challenging obstacles and sudden drops. The gameplay is simple to pick up but difficult to master.
instructions: On Desktop: Use the left and right arrow keys or "A" and "D" keys to control the ball’s direction. On Mobile Devices: Swipe left or right or tilt your device to steer the ball.

title: The Walking Deadblocks
description: A fast-paced, cooperative survival game where players battle relentless waves of zombies across dynamic day-night cycles. Survive as long as possible by managing resources, unlocking new maps, and utilizing unique character abilities. Nights bring increased danger with randomized enemy spawns, challenging players to strategize using generators and lights to stay alive.
instructions: • Single Player Mode: o Movement: W, A, S, D o Shooting: SPACE o Weapon Switching: Use Q, E, or keys 1-5 • Co-op Mode: o Player 1:  Movement: Arrow keys  Shooting: L  Weapon Switching: Use "," and "." o Player 2:  Movement: W, A, S, D  Shooting: SPACE  Weapon Switching: Use Q and E

title: Sniper Freeze
description: Experience thrilling sniper action in Sniper Freeze, a unique online game where you hunt down moving rule-breakers marked in red. Sharp graphics and challenging gameplay await - stay alert and precise!
instructions: Turn on freeze and target those who keep moving. Keep your finger on the screen to aim, release your finger to shoot. Eliminate only those who violated the rules and are marked in red. Do not eliminate stationary players, otherwise you will lose.

title: Cat Match 3
description: Dive into Cat Match 3, the thrilling Match-3 puzzle adventure! Match, swap, and blast through vibrant levels filled with unique obstacles, epic power-ups, and explosive combos. Journey through enchanting worlds, unlock daily rewards, and conquer special events. Challenge friends on the leaderboard or team up in exciting tournaments. With increasing difficulty and endless puzzles, every swipe brings you closer to victory. Ready to start matching magic? Join the adventure today!
instructions: Use the mouse to play

title: Red Light Green Light
description: Step into the thrilling world of Red Light Green Light, a fast-paced and addictive game inspired by the classic playground challenge! Test your reflexes, strategy, and timing as you race against others to reach the finish line without getting caught.
instructions: Tap & Hold LMP or press Spacebar to MOVE

title: Fortress of the Sinister
description: Fortress of Sinister is a thrilling 3D strategy game that blends tactical depth with exciting challenges. Lead a team of distinctive characters through four treacherous fortresses teeming with enemies and traps. Take part in strategic turn-based battles on grid-based arenas, recruit unique units like the Mushroom Priest and Night Hunter, and unveil hidden secrets. Collect valuable loot, upgrade your skills, and unlock powerful allies to face escalating challenges and excel in survival mode.
instructions: Use the mouse to play the game. all movement takes place at the expense of the mouse. You won't need any buttons. Complete the training at the beginning of the game to figure out exactly how it works.

title: Solitaire Emperor - Secrets of Fate
description: Enter the magical world of Tarot in this captivating solitaire adventure! Each card tells a story, and every level presents a new puzzle. Meet iconic Tarot characters like the wise Hermit and bold Knight of Swords as they guide your journey. A dark sorcerer threatens to unravel the Arcana's magic—only you can uncover its secrets, solve riddles, and restore balance. Will your intuition and strategy save this mystical realm?
instructions: Clear all cards from the field to complete the level by following the classic sequence: Ace, King, Queen, Jack, 10, and so on. Earn more coins by keeping cards in the deck and building long chains. Use gold cards to extend chains or as a last resort when no moves remain.

title: Pirates Match The Lost Treasure
description: Enjoy this pirates adventure and find the lost treasure . Immerse yourself in an exciting match 3 game with many levels and excellent graphics. Solve all the match 3 puzzles and escape find the pirates lost treasure using your skills, and amazing power-ups to complete the levels.
instructions: Use the mouse to play

title: Mahjong Match
description: Immerse yourself in our brain games, each level waiting for your mahjong match strategic touch. Your objective? Match three mahjongs of the same color to clear the board puzzle. With every level presenting an array of mahjong tiles and brain games, the excitement of puzzle games will never wane.
instructions: lan your moves carefully in this mahjong games, match three mahjongs, and claim victory over each level

title: Bear vs Humans
description: Play as a crazy bear in this exciting 3D game! Ride a log with squirrels, destroy campsites, destroy objects and trees, and scare people with a loud roar. Use squirrels as throwing weapons and create chaos in the forest! Dive into a fun and wild world full of destruction and adventure!
instructions: WASD / Arrows - movement; Space - Brake; E - Throw a squirrel; Shift - Acceleration; Z - Roar; X - Healing; C - Acceleration of squirrels.

title: Brawl Stars
description: Welcome to a multiplayer arena game! Brawl Stars will take you into a world full of action .io battles! You will experience nervous PVP battles and a unique evolution system. Choose your favorite hero including fire dragons, electric dogs or flower spirits.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Star Wing
description: Earth's last hope is in your hands, take control of the lone spaceship and protect Earth from alien swarms. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the Universe from its evil enemies. In this space shooting game, you will be facing an increasingly large number of enemies in hazardous environments. As the game progresses, you will earn the right to upgrade your spacecraft to unleash its full lethal capacity.
instructions: * Touch screen to move and kill all enemies. * Collect items to upgrade or change your weapons.

title: Tsunami Race
description: Have you ever faced the thrill of escaping a giant tsunami? In this action-packed game, you’ll choose from a variety of unique characters and race to stay ahead of your opponents. The game offers three exciting modes: outrun a tsunami in Tsunami Race, dodge flying fruits in Fruit Run, and slide to glory in Water Slides—knocking down opponents and collecting boosters along the way. Only the fastest and most strategic players will emerge as champions!
instructions: Tap and Hold on the screen to move character

title: Bubble Ball
description: Bubble Ball is an untimed bubble-popping strategy game with a classic interface and arcade special effects noises. The player uses an arrow shooter to pop clusters of three or more matching bubbles to earn points and special gifts.
instructions: Using mouse, click the left one to shoot

title: Hard Rock Zombie Truck
description: We ride on the roof of a truck, shoot, blow up and crush zombies! This is a 2D shooter where you need to destroy crowds of zombies and monsters by shooting, crushing and exploding them. At the same time, it is necessary to save living people. We also upgrade our weapons and abilities! Lots of funny sounds, lots of blood (cartoonish!!!) and humor.
instructions: (WASD + mouse) or (Virtual joystick) A/D - drive slower/faster, S - grenade, W - air support, Spacebar - rocket engine, Mouse - shoot.

title: Winter Mahjong
description: You can test your pattern detection skills in this relaxed mahjong & connect puzzle game with winter christmas theme. You can eliminate pair of same tiles. The line connecting the two clicked tiles can't have more than 2 corners. Some levels the tiles can auto slide( to left, to right, to up, to bottom). Can you clear the board before time runs out? Enjoying matching winter tiles with 32 levels in this game.
instructions: You mouse or tap to play this christmas mahjong game.

title: 2 Player Online Chess
description: Enjoy the classic game of chess with 2 Player Online Chess! Play solo against the computer or challenge a friend in 2-player mode. Easy to use, with no distractions—just simple, fun chess for everyone. Start playing today!
instructions: Use your mouse or swipe with your finger to control the action
